name: Jungle Giants

name: Lesser Jasper Spellstone
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. @(Gain 3 Armor to upgrade.)
flavor:
In ancient woods, elves fought the curse
The demon’s shadow to disperse
But hatred raged and frail souls turned
Now horned and hooved their forests burned.

name: Living Roots
text: Choose One - Deal $2 damage; or Summon two 1/1 Saplings.
flavor: 2 out of 2 saplings recommend that you summon the saplings.

name: Lost in the Park
text: Questline: Gain 4 Attack with your hero. Reward: Gain 5 Armor.
flavor: Mister, have you seen my Archdruid?

name: Mark of the Lotus
text: Give your minions +1/+1.
flavor: The mark of the Lotus is a little flower drawn in permanent marker on the ankle.

name: Naturalize
text: Destroy a minion.\nYour opponent draws 2_cards.

text: Deal damage equal to your hero's Attack to a minion.

name: Strength in Numbers

flavor: One minion, two minions... tree minions!

text: [x]Quest: End 4 turns\nwith any unspent Mana.\nReward: Ossirian Tear.
flavor: The official term is "strategic laziness."

name: Vibrant Squirrel
text: [x]Deathrattle: Shuffle 4 Acorns\ninto your deck. When drawn,\nsummon a 2/1 Squirrel.

name: Worthy Expedition
text: Discover a Choose One card.
flavor: This isn't where I parked my mount.

name: Anodized Robo Cub
text: Taunt. Choose One -\n+1 Attack; or +1 Health.

name: Breath of Dreams

flavor: Ysera has the worst morning breath.

name: Composting
text: Give your minions\n"Deathrattle: Draw\n__a card."
flavor: The Treants really give their bodies to the cause.

name: Crystal Merchant
text: If you have any unspent Mana at the end of your turn, draw a card.
flavor: I won't ask about your mana curve if you don't ask where I got these.

name: Crystalsong Portal
text: Discover a Druid minion. If your hand has no minions, keep all 3.
flavor: Experience the draw of the wild!

name: Darnassus Aspirant
text: Battlecry: Gain an empty Mana Crystal.\nDeathrattle: Lose a Mana Crystal.
flavor: She loves mana crystals, she hates mana crystals.   So fickle!

name: Dendrologist
text: Battlecry: If you control a Treant, Discover a spell.
flavor: He's teaching his little buddy to talk, but all it says is, "I am Gloop."

name: Dreamway Guardians
text: Summon two 1/2 Dryads with Lifesteal.
flavor: They're a nightmare to deal with.

name: Druid of the Saber
text: [x]Choose One - Transform\ninto a 2/1 with Charge;\nor a 3/2 with Stealth.
flavor: That's saberTEETH, not like curved pirate blades.  That's a different kind of druid.  Druid of the Curved Pirate Blades.

name: Druid of the Swarm
text: Choose One - Transform into a 1/2 with Poisonous; or a 1/5 with Taunt.
flavor: The druid awoke from troubling dreams to find herself transformed into a giant spider.

name: Gibberling
text: Spellburst: Summon a Gibberling.
flavor: "As a Linguistics student I have studied the Gibberlings. I have determined they are speaking Gibberish."

name: Guess the Weight
text: Draw a card. Guess if your next card costs more or less to draw it.
flavor: "And then at the last second, I'll shapeshift into cat form!"

name: Ironbark
text: Give a minion +1/+3 and Taunt.\nCosts (0) if you have at least 7 Mana Crystals.
